name: Sam Fnf (unfinished)
description:
Oh, hi.

Didn't notice you there.

My name is Mason, welcome to my first game.

It's a Friday Night Funkin game.

I made a character called Sam.

When you install the file, it just opens a tab that shows the game.

I used a song called Flat Zone from the Kapi mod. So credit to that.

Also credit to Depiik for teaching me how to make an fnf game.

I usually use arrow keys, so to make it different for me, I made the controls WASD and I don't usually use that.

Also, this was made on scratch, so just click on the green flag to play! Also, don't forget to fullscreen!

I tried to shade it good, so tell me what you think in the comments.

Anyways, enjoy my first game!
